import React,{useState} from 'react' import './bugForm.css' import BugModel from '../../../Models/bugModel' import {createBugs} from '../../../Controllers/Redux/bugSlice' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import {} from '../../../Controllers/Redux/authSlice' export default (props) =>{ const [bugObject,setBugObject] = useState(new BugModel(props.bug)); const dispatch = useDispatch() setBugObject({ time:Date, create: auth }) function inputChanged(e){ setBugObject({ ...bugObject, [e.target.name]:e.target.value }) } function createBug(e){ e.preventDefault(); dispatch(createBugs(bugObject)) } return (
{props.title == "Edit Bug" && }

{props.title}

) }
